A '''tuff brick slab''' is a [[tuff brick]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Tuff brick slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row
|Tuff Brick Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wood
|horizontal=1}}

=== Note blocks ===
Tuff brick slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.

== Sounds ==
{{IN|Bedrock}}, when a tuff brick slab is combined into a double slab, the block's use sound is played.<ref>{{Bug|MCPE-79659}}</ref>
